content.rendered:
In this science fiction adventure film, which is also the defining origin story of the hero who inspired the toy character, Buzz Lightyear, the astronaut sets off on an intergalactic adventure with a group of ambitious rookies and his robot companion, Sox, by his side.

Directed By Angus MacLane

Written By Angus MacLane. Matthew Aldrich. Jason Headley

Stars: Chris Evans. Keke Palmer. Peter Sohn
